name: Static

footer_blocks.title: About Us
footer_blocks.value: We are highly experienced in making a range of garments, such as knitwear, woven garments, and sweaters. Our range includes T-shirts, polo shirts, woven shirts, tank tops, jackets, hoodies and sweatshirts, skirts, shorts, trousers, cargo pants, sweatpants, 3-quarter pants, pullovers, underwear, lingerie, leggings, bras, panties, caps and hats, baby sets, rompers, denim pants and shirts, sexy pants, beachwear, leisurewear, nightwear and sportswear. All of our products are certified by OEKO-TEX, BSCI and SEDEX and we are proud to be a clothing manufacturer based in Bangladesh.

footer_blocks.title: Quick Contact
footer_blocks.value: Siatex Bangladesh Limited House # 8, Road # 6, 5th Floor Block – D, Niketon Gulshan – 1, Dhaka 1213 (+880-2) 222-262-889 (Office) Working day: Monday To Saturday Office Hours: 10.00 am to 6.00 pm
